output.dependency: The column representing the beer name has a dependency on the column describing the beer style, as each beer name corresponds to a specific style of beer.

The column representing the alcohol percentage has a dependency on the column indicating a quality score, suggesting that certain alcohol content levels may influence or correlate with higher or lower quality ratings.
The column indicating the brewery name has a dependency on the column representing the city, as each brewery is located in a specific city.
The column for city has a dependency on the column for state, indicating that the city mentioned is associated with a particular state.
